Ä€nanda, you should accept these names of the sages who emerged first.
They will attain ultimate auspiciousness, accomplish their aspirations, accomplish their spells, always practice austerities, and dwell in mountain forests.
They will have power and freedom, and their transformations will be swift.
With the five supernatural powers, they will roam at will through the sky.
I will now proclaim their names.
They are called the great sage of the eight liberations, the great sage of the left,

Ä€nanda, these are the great sages who appeared first.
They created the four Vedas for the sake of the mind.
They practiced austerities, were fierce, and had great power.
These also used this great peacock king's mantra scripture.
To protect someone, allowing them to live for a hundred years and see a hundred autumns.
